overview: In this sixth installment of the Morgan Sex Project Series, Jonathan Morgan, and a cast of horny head for fun in the sun on the beaches of Hawaii. Join this wild group, as they enjoy an extreme weekend filled with surf, sand and pleasures of the flesh. Tourists beware, this ain't no vacation for the faint of heart...This is an all-out, no holds barred, raunchy, wicked sex romp.
tagline: Hawaii: you never know when to expect eruptions.
title: The Morgan Sex Project 6
